# add2ggplot

The goal of add2ggplot is to add more theme for your ggplot object.

## Installation

You can install the released version of add2ggplot from [Github](https://github.com/JiaxiangBU/add2ggplot) with:

```{r eval=F}
devtools::install_github('JiaxiangBU/add2ggplot')
```

```{r eval=F}
library(add2ggplot)
```
